description: Here, blood orange segments are tossed into a salad of roasted carrots, salty olives and freshly ground spices – a refreshing, satisfying and stunning dish with sunset colors.
title: Moroccan Carrot-Blood Orange Salad
title_page: Moroccan Carrot-Blood Orange Salad Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
Here, blood orange segments are tossed into a salad of roasted carrots, salty olives and freshly ground spices – a refreshing, satisfying and stunning dish with sunset colors.
Featured in: Blood Oranges Add A Ruby Hue To Dishes And Desserts.
Learn: How to Make Salad
